query:
INSERT INTO edc_chemicals (cas_number, chemical_name, common_names, chemical_class, edc_category, hormone_systems_affected, health_effects, common_sources, exposure_routes, bioaccumulation_potential, regulatory_status, epa_data) VALUES
('335-67-1', 'Perfluorooctanoic acid', '["PFOA", "C8"]', 'PFAS (Forever chemical)', 'confirmed', '["reproductive", "thyroid", "immune"]', 'Thyroid disruption, reproductive toxicity, immune suppression, increased cholesterol, cancer risk (kidney, testicular)', '["Non-stick cookware", "Water-resistant fabrics", "Food packaging", "Firefighting foam", "Contaminated drinking water"]', '["ingestion", "inhalation"]', 'very high', 'EPA health advisory 0.004 ppt (2022), phased out by major manufacturers', '{"epa_health_advisory": "0.004 ppt", "half_life": "2.3-3.8 years in humans", "persistence": "Does not break down in environment"}'),
('1763-23-1', 'Perfluorooctanesulfonic acid', '["PFOS"]', 'PFAS (Forever chemical)', 'confirmed', '["reproductive", "thyroid", "immune"]', 'Thyroid disruption, reproductive effects, immune suppression, liver toxicity, developmental effects', '["Stain-resistant fabrics", "Firefighting foam", "Food packaging", "Contaminated water"]', '["ingestion", "inhalation"]', 'very high', 'EPA health advisory 0.02 ppt (2022), restricted globally under Stockholm Convention', '{"epa_health_advisory": "0.02 ppt", "stockholm_convention": "Listed 2009", "persistence": "Extremely persistent"}'),
('3380-34-5', 'Triclosan', '["TCS"]', 'Antimicrobial agent', 'confirmed', '["thyroid", "reproductive"]', 'Thyroid hormone disruption, reproductive effects, antibiotic resistance concerns', '["Antibacterial soap", "Toothpaste", "Cosmetics", "Cleaning products"]', '["dermal", "ingestion"]', 'moderate', 'Banned in US antibacterial soaps (2016), restricted in EU', '{"fda_ban": "2016 in consumer soaps", "environmental_concern": "Aquatic toxicity"}'),
('99-76-3', 'Methylparaben', '["Methyl parahydroxybenzoate"]', 'Preservative', 'suspected', '["reproductive"]', 'Weak estrogenic activity, reproductive effects at high doses', '["Cosmetics", "Personal care products", "Food preservatives", "Pharmaceuticals"]', '["dermal", "ingestion"]', 'low', 'Generally recognized as safe at low levels, restricted concentrations in EU cosmetics', '{"eu_limit": "0.4% in cosmetics"}'),
('94-13-3', 'Propylparaben', '["Propyl parahydroxybenzoate"]', 'Preservative', 'suspected', '["reproductive"]', 'Estrogenic activity, reproductive concerns', '["Cosmetics", "Personal care products", "Food preservatives"]', '["dermal", "ingestion"]', 'low', 'Restricted in EU cosmetics for children under 3', '{"eu_restriction": "Banned in leave-on products for children under 3"}');
command:
